indicated for impregnating and encapsulating temperature sensitive units
3m scotchcast electrical resin 210 is a semi-flexible epoxy, ideal for use primarily as a motor repair resin
low exothermic and long pot life
it exhibits low stress, low exotherm, good fuel and oil resistance, long pot life, and permanent mechanical and thermal shock resistance.
